001package com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.WalletMessage.credential;
002
003import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.WalletMessage.WalletMessage;
004import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.WalletMessage.WalletMessageType;
005
006
007public class CredentialMessage implements WalletMessage {
008
009    static WalletMessageType TYPE = WalletMessageType.CREDENTIAL_EVENT;
010
011    String rawMessage;
012
013    CredentialEventMessage credentialEvent;
014
015    @Override
016    public WalletMessageType getType() {
017        return TYPE;
018    }
019
020    @Override
021    public String getRawMessage() {
022        return rawMessage;
023    }
024
025    @Override
026    public void setRawMessage(String rawMessage) {
027        this.rawMessage = rawMessage;
028    }
029
030    public CredentialEventType getCredentialEvent(){
031        return credentialEvent.event;
032    }
033
034    public String getReferenceCredentialId(){
035        return credentialEvent.referenceClaimId;
036    }
037
038    public CredentialAction getAction(){
039        return credentialEvent.action;
040    }
041
042}
043
044class CredentialEventMessage{
045    CredentialEventType event;
046    String referenceClaimId;
047    CredentialAction action;
048
049}
050
